verses.verse: And the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8193>language,<s%> and of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1697>speech.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> as they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from the <S%H4480>east,<s%> <S%H6924><s%> that they <S%H4672>found<s%> a <S%H1237>plain<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H8152>Shinar;<s%> and they <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>

And they <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H7453>another,<s%> Go <S%H3051>to,<s%> let us <S%H3835>make<s%> <S%H3843>brick,<s%> and <S%H8313>burn<s%> them <S%H8316>throughly.<s%> And they <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H3843>brick<s%> for <S%H68>stone,<s%> and <S%H2564>slime<s%> <S%H1961>had<s%> they for <S%H2563>mortar.<s%>

And they <S%H559>said,<s%> Go <S%H3051>to,<s%> let us <S%H1129>build<s%> us a <S%H5892>city<s%> and a <S%H4026>tower,<s%> whose <S%H7218>top<s%> may reach unto <S%H8064>heaven;<s%> and let us <S%H6213>make<s%> us a <S%H8034>name,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> we be scattered <S%H6327>abroad<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>earth.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> came <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> and the <S%H4026>tower,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%> <S%H1129>built.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> is <S%H259>one,<s%> and they have <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8193>language;<s%> and <S%H2088>this<s%> they <S%H2490>begin<s%> to <S%H6213>do:<s%> and <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H3808>nothing<s%> <S%H3605><s%> will be <S%H1219>restrained<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> them, <S%H834>which<s%> they have <S%H2161>imagined<s%> to <S%H6213>do.<s%>

Go <S%H3051>to,<s%> let us go <S%H3381>down,<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H1101>confound<s%> their <S%H8193>language,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> they may <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8085>understand<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H7453>another's<s%> <S%H8193>speech.<s%>

So the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> scattered them <S%H6327>abroad<s%> <S%H853><s%> from <S%H4480>thence<s%> <S%H8033><s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth:<s%> and they left <S%H2308>off<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> is the <S%H8034>name<s%> of it <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H894>Babel;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> did <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H1101>confound<s%> the <S%H8193>language<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth:<s%> and from <S%H4480>thence<s%> <S%H8033><s%> did the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> scatter them <S%H6327>abroad<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are the <S%H8435>generations<s%> of <S%H8035>Shem:<s%> <S%H8035>Shem<s%> was a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old,<s%> and <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H775>Arphaxad<s%> two <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the flood: <S%H3999><s%>

And <S%H8035>Shem<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H775>Arphaxad<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>
And <S%H775>Arphaxad<s%> <S%H2425>lived<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> Salah: <S%H7974><s%>

And <S%H775>Arphaxad<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H7974>Salah<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>
And <S%H7974>Salah<s%> <S%H2425>lived<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> Eber: <S%H5677><s%>

And <S%H7974>Salah<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5677>Eber<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>
And <S%H5677>Eber<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> Peleg: <S%H6389><s%>

And <S%H5677>Eber<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H6389>Peleg<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>
And <S%H6389>Peleg<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> Reu: <S%H7466><s%>

And <S%H6389>Peleg<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H7466>Reu<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>
And <S%H7466>Reu<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> Serug: <S%H8286><s%>

And <S%H7466>Reu<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H8286>Serug<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>
And <S%H8286>Serug<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> Nahor: <S%H5152><s%>

And <S%H8286>Serug<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5152>Nahor<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>
And <S%H5152>Nahor<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H8672>nine<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> Terah: <S%H8646><s%>

And <S%H5152>Nahor<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H8646>Terah<s%> a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H8672>nineteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>
And <S%H8646>Terah<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H87>Abram,<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5152>Nahor,<s%> and <S%H2039>Haran.<s%>

Now <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H8435>generations<s%> of <S%H8646>Terah:<s%> <S%H8646>Terah<s%> <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H87>Abram,<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5152>Nahor,<s%> and <S%H2039>Haran;<s%> and <S%H2039>Haran<s%> <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3876>Lot.<s%>

And <S%H2039>Haran<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H8646>Terah<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of his <S%H4138>nativity,<s%> in <S%H218>Ur<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldees.<s%>

And <S%H87>Abram<s%> and <S%H5152>Nahor<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> them <S%H802>wives:<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H87>Abram's<s%> <S%H802>wife<s%> was <S%H8297>Sarai;<s%> and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H5152>Nahor's<s%> <S%H802>wife,<s%> <S%H4435>Milcah,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H2039>Haran,<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H4435>Milcah,<s%> and the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H3252>Iscah.<s%>
But <S%H8297>Sarai<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H6135>barren;<s%> she had <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H2056>child.<s%>

And <S%H8646>Terah<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H87>Abram<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H3876>Lot<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2039>Haran<s%> his <S%H1121>son's<s%> <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H8297>Sarai<s%> his <S%H3618>daughter-in-law,<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H87>Abram's<s%> <S%H802>wife;<s%> and they went <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> them from <S%H4480>Ur<s%> <S%H218><s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldees,<s%> to <S%H1980>go<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan;<s%> and they <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H2771>Haran,<s%> and <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>
And the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H8646>Terah<s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8141>years:<s%> and <S%H8646>Terah<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> in <S%H2771>Haran.<s%>
